snippet: Our partnership with Community Wood Recycling resulted in 2,074 tonnes of wood from our sites being reused (29%), recycled into woodchip (59%) or processed into firewood (12%) saving 1,033 tonnes of CO2 and supporting paid jobs for around 22 people and training for 37 people.
